message: Let's split it evenly, Bob.  Fair is fair!
Come on, Alice, I'm taking a bit more. Inflation is on my side!
Okay, Bob, I'll meet you halfway.  But let's make a deal - if I take the lead next round, I'll give you a slightly bigger cut.
Alice, think about it, every round you wait, your money is worth less. Take this deal and you'll still get a good chunk of cash!
Bob, I'm getting a bit tired of this game.  Let's split it 45-55, and we can both go home with some money.  We're both losing value with each round.
